title: Dulquer Salmaan
summary: Dulquer Salmaan (born 28 July 1986) is an Indian actor, playback singer and film producer who predominantly works in Malayalam language films. He has also appeared in few Tamil, Hindi and Telugu language films. Salmaan graduated with a bachelor's degree in business management from Purdue University, and worked as a business manager in Dubai before pursuing a career in acting. He is the winner of four Filmfare Awards South and one Kerala State Film Award.
